resources.string: Hey friend , i am using "GCOEAN'S SCHITAYU APP" This app is what all we need !(Design and Develop by students of GCOEA CSE BATCH 2015-2019) this is great have a look : : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rrbofficial.btrapplock
this app is minor project of gcoea CSE 3rd year students (Batch of 2015-2019)namely ,Rohit Balage,Bhagyashri Sawarkar,Tejas Tipre
(this message is send by using Gcoeans Schitayu App) \n download now : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rrbofficial.btrapplock

The Word "Schitayu" is taken from Russian Language which actually means "I Think" or "I Beleive" 
 "Gcoean's Schitayu" is an efforts of CSE 3rd year students of Government College Of Engineering, Amravati.(Batch of 2015-2019) in an idea of collaboration whole android system on one platform. "Gcoean's Schitayu" is an minor project of Rohit Balage,Bhagyashri Sawarkar,Tejas Tipre during their academic section (VI Sem Summer 2018).
 later knowing the significance and uniqueness of an app the project of Schitayu is extended to major one too (August 2018). and further the team becomes Strong lead with adding askhay as new member. 
This app invokes the multiple functions that daily user need to be interact. 
 *Wondering about why "Gcoean's Schitayu? The word Schitayu means "Beleive". so as per name extends the developers of an app is mean on beleiving on the concept of collaboration of android system with low RAM uses and battery consumption.
